entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor bypasses running client Program.cs and client side DI fails #55648
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #55647
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #55646
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #55645
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #55644
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55643
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55642
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55641
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55640
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55639
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55638
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55637
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #55636
  • "prerender: false" is ignored in child components #55635
  • Cookie Authentication Handler session key is re-used even when sign out is called before signing in #55634
  • In Blazor, an input field with type="email" incorrectly converts extended ASCII characters in Google Chrome #55632
  • Blazor server azure b2c redirect issue #55631
  • Attribute name="" from Input* when included, the data from form cannot be submitted. #55627
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorwasmbenchmark #55626
    9.0-preview5
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #55625
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #55624
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #55623
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #55622
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #55621
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #55620
  • Use property attributes to define text in the header of QuickGrid. #55616
    Backlog

Closed

  • HttpGet MVC breaks Blazor server websockets #55559
  • Blazor EditForm Enhance=True with StreamRendering #55608
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Static Rendering, AntiForgery and Incorrect Content-Type: Exceptions #55582
    9.0-preview7
  • EditForm does not bind values #55591
    9.0-preview6
  • Missleading unhandled exception error log #54433

PullRequests

Created

  • Add AnyHeader and AnyMethod #55650
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update spa-templates submodule #55649
    tell-mode, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Fix typos in multiple files of docs #55619
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Avoid validating antiforgery for non form data content types #55604
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • [release/2.1] (deps): Bump modules/EntityFrameworkCore from `74055e1` to `6d79997` #55498
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 2.1.x
  • Use built-in OpenAPI support in templates #55343
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • [Blazor] Adds compresion support for all assets in an application #55558
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add an API to describe the render mode (if any) a component is running in #55577
    area-blazor
  • Revert "Remove __non_webpack_require__ workaround and split Node dependencies correctly (#48154)" #55229
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.x
  • Retry `Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.KeyRingProviderTests.MultipleThreadsForceRefresh` #55228
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix flaky CanRenderComponentWithPersistedState test variations #55603
    area-blazor
  • Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #55347
    area-blazor
  • Improve performance of UriHelper.GetDisplayUrl #55611
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Add separate activities for Hub methods #55439
    area-signalr
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Quarantine CanResetSharedKey #54841
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • Stop retrying template tests #55605
    * NO MERGE *
